description: This file contains integration tests for the 'Agent' class using the 'CerebrasOpenAI' model and 'GoogleSearchTools'. It tests various scenarios including synchronous and asynchronous tool usage, streaming responses, and content verification.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage in a synchronous context, verifying response content and tool call presence.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses and verifies that tool calls are observed during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage, verifying response content and tool call presence.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test, verifying tool calls during streamed responses.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_content
methods.description: Tests tool usage with a different prompt that includes a summarization request, verifying response content.
